# bad-hosts
A blocklist file for blocking ads, trackers and malware domains.

[![GitHub last commit](https://img.shields.io/github/last-commit/cenk/bad-hosts/main?labelColor=808080&logo=github&logoColor=black&cacheSeconds=300)](https://github.com/cenk/bad-hosts/commits) [![GitHub commit activity](https://img.shields.io/github/commit-activity/w/cenk/bad-hosts/main?labelColor=808080&logo=github&logoColor=black&label=commits&color=brightgreen&cacheSeconds=300)](https://github.com/cenk/bad-hosts/commits) [![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-blue?labelColor=808080&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cenk/bad-hosts/main/LICENSE)

- Unique domains: 1,947,711
- Without subdomains: 1,300,981
- Last update: 29 Jan 2026 21:50:12 UTC
- Version: 2026.01.29.01


### Downloads:

| Format             | Domain count      | Download Link |
|:------------------ | -----------------:|:-------------:|
| *Adblock Plus*     | 1,300,981 | [Download](https://dl.cenk.app/bad-hosts/bad-hosts-abp) |
| *Wildcard domains* | 1,300,981 | [Download](https://dl.cenk.app/bad-hosts/bad-hosts-wildcard) |

| *Plain domains*    | 1,947,711 | [Download](https://dl.cenk.app/bad-hosts/bad-hosts-domains) |
